items.title: Nvidia Just Became the World's Most Valuable Company. Here's What May Happen Next.
items.description: Nvidia, with a market value of $3.444 trillion, topped software giant Microsoft.  This happened a week after Nvidia's report of double-digit revenue growth and strong demand for its artificial intelligence chips.  Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) might be the company everyone's talking about thanks to its dominance in the high-growth area of artificial intelligence (AI), but it remained behind one other tech player, Microsoft, in terms of market value.

items.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Surpasses Market Returns: Some Facts Worth Knowing
items.description: In the closing of the recent trading day, Microsoft (MSFT) stood at $463.87, denoting a +0.19% change from the preceding trading day.

items.title: Nvidia (NVDA) Tops Microsoft, Becomes World's Most Valuable Company Again
items.description: Investors continue betting on Nvidia's dominance in AI chip infrastructure

items.title: Why Centrus Energy Stock Soared Today
items.description: Is Microsoft slowing down on artificial intelligence (AI) investment? Amazon and Meta certainly are not -- and that's bullish for nuclear stocks.

items.title: Reddit Sues Anthropic, Says AI Company Exploited User Data
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Reddit Inc. sued artificial intelligence firm Anthropic, saying it has used the social media company’s content without permission to train its AI models.
